0.text: Innate: Feathers shot by Xayah will linger in the ground at maximum range for 6 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Feathers shot by Xayah will linger in the ground at maximum range for 6 seconds.

1.text: Innate: Xayah's ability casts generate 3 stacks of Clean Cuts, lasting for 8 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts, and stacking up to 5 times. Xayah's basic attacks are empowered to each consume a stack on-attack to instead shoot a Feather that deals the attack's damage to the primary target and 30 / 40 / 50% (based on level) AD physical damage to other enemies hit, with the secondary damage also  critically striking if the main attack does.
1.html: Innate: Xayah's ability casts generate 3 stacks of Clean Cuts, lasting for 8 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts, and stacking up to 5 times. Xayah's basic attacks are empowered to each consume a stack on-attack to instead shoot a Feather that deals the attack's damage to the primary target and 30 / 40 / 50% (based on level) AD physical damage to other enemies hit, with the secondary damage also critically striking if the main attack does.
markedPassages: 30 / 40 / 50% (based on level) AD
critically striking

2.text: Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Xayah or  Rakan is channeling  Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's  Recall completes.
2.html: Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Xayah or Rakan is channeling Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's Recall completes.
markedPassages: Rakan
Recall
Recall

2.text: CAST TIME: 0.25 − 0.1 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

0.text: Active: Xayah throws a volley of two Feathers in the target direction that each deal physical damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Xayah throws a volley of two Feathers in the target direction that each deal physical damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Targets hit after the first take 50% reduced damage.
1.html: Targets hit after the first take 50% reduced damage.

0.text: Active: Xayah enters a frenzy for 4 seconds, gaining  bonus attack speed and empowering her basic attacks to strike a second time, dealing 20% damage.
0.html: Active: Xayah enters a frenzy for 4 seconds, gaining  bonus attack speed and empowering her basic attacks to strike a second time, dealing 20% damage.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

1.text: Whenever Xayah hits an enemy  champion with the strike, she gains  30% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Whenever Xayah hits an enemy champion with the strike, she gains  30% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
30% bonus movement speed

2.text: If  Rakan is nearby upon cast, he also becomes empowered, and gains the  bonus movement speed at the same time as Xayah.
2.html: If Rakan is nearby upon cast, he also becomes empowered, and gains the  bonus movement speed at the same time as Xayah.
markedPassages: Rakan
bonus movement speed
possibleConcerningAbilities: If  Rakan is nearby upon cast, he also becomes empowered, and gains the  bonus movement speed at the same time as Xayah.

0.text: Active: Xayah recalls all planted Feathers to shoot back to her, each dealing physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 0% − 75% (based on critical strike chance). Bladecaller deals 50% damage to  minions.
0.html: Active: Xayah recalls all planted Feathers to shoot back to her, each dealing physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 0% − 75% (based on critical strike chance). Bladecaller deals 50% damage to minions.
markedPassages: 0% − 75% (based on critical strike chance)
minions

1.text: An enemy takes 100% − 10% (based on previous feathers hit) damage from a Feather.
1.html: An enemy takes 100% − 10% (based on previous feathers hit) damage from a Feather.

2.text: A target hit by at least three Feathers is  rooted for 1.25 seconds.
2.html: A target hit by at least three Feathers is rooted for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: rooted

3.text: Enemies can be hit by an individual Feather only once per pass.
3.html: Enemies can be hit by an individual Feather only once per pass.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can be hit by an individual Feather only once per pass.

0.text: Active: Xayah leaps into the air, becoming  untargetable and  ghosted for 1.5 seconds. After 1 second, she shoots 5 Feathers in a cone in the target direction that deal physical damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Xayah leaps into the air, becoming untargetable and ghosted for 1.5 seconds. After 1 second, she shoots 5 Feathers in a cone in the target direction that deal physical damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: untargetable
ghosted

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Cloudburst: Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CLOUDBURST:  Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within  750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Transcendence: If you have at least 40% critical strike chance, basic attacks on-attack reduce your basic abilities' current cooldowns by 15% of their remaining cooldowns.
Unique – Impermanence: Your ability damage and proc damage dealt by abilities is increased by 0% − 20% (based on critical strike chance).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRANSCENDENCE: If you have at least 40% critical strike chance, basic attacks on-attack reduce your basic abilities' current cooldowns by 15% of their remaining cooldowns.
